scripts.clean: rm -r ~/Documents/Left-darwin-x64/ ; rm -r ~/Documents/Left-linux-x64/ ; rm -r ~/Documents/Left-win32-x64/ ; echo 'cleaned build location'
scripts.build_linux: electron-packager . left --platform=linux  --arch=x64 --out ~/Documents/ --overwrite --icon=icon.ico ; cp ../post_install/* ~/Documents/left-linux-x64/ ; echo 'Built for LINUX'
scripts.build: npm run clean ; npm run build_osx ; npm run build_linux ; npm run build_win
scripts.push: npm run build ; npm run push_osx ; npm run push_linux ; npm run push_win ; npm run clean ; npm run status
